Home → Recommendations & reviews → Meet the Author

Meet the Author

Meet the Author: Rebecca Tope

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 2, 2018

Rebecca Tope talks about cosy crime, her latest work and her teetering 'to be read' pile.

Meet the Author: Gregg Hurwitz

Written by Brandon King · Published Dec 12, 2017

Gregg Hurwitz tells us about the thorough research behind his Evan Smoak novels and his passion for libraries.

Meet the Author: Simon Brett

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 28, 2017

Prolific author Simon Brett tells us how he came to write crime fiction and reveals the title of his next book.

Meet the Author: C. J. Tudor

Written by Brandon King · Published Nov 14, 2017

Exciting new author C. J. Tudor tells us about writing The Chalk Man, its follow-up, and her encounter with Robert Downey Jr.

Meet the Author: Christopher Fowler

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 31, 2017

Christopher Fowler tells us about his literary influences, Bryant & May and his latest book, The Book of Forgotten Authors.

Meet the Author: Emma Flint

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 17, 2017

Emma Flint tells us how her fascination with a real-life murder case led her to write Little Deaths.

Meet the Author: Rosie Archer

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 10, 2017

Author Rosie Archer tells us how she writes two books a year and about her next novel.

Meet the Author: Tracy Borman

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 25, 2017

Historian and author Tracy Borman tells us about working at Hampton Court, investigating the Tudors' private lives and her forthcoming appearance at the Lavenham Literary Festival.

Meet the Author: Angela Marsons

Written by Brandon King · Published Sep 12, 2017

Crime writer Angela Marsons takes us through her writing process and implores aspiring writers not to give up.

Meet the Author: Mick Herron

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 29, 2017

Mystery and thriller writer Mick Herron tells us how libraries have allowed him to read widely and voraciously.
